sites.title: Everland Adventure Park
sites.description: One of the largest theme parks in Port Harcourt, featuring thrilling roller coasters, a safari zoo, and themed gardens.

sites.title: Golden Sands Beach Resort
sites.description: A tropical paradise with white sandy beaches, crystal-clear waters, and numerous water sports activities.

sites.title: Mystic Caverns
sites.description: A breathtaking underground cave system with stunning stalactites, underground rivers, and guided adventure tours.

sites.title: Skyline Thrill Park
sites.description: A high-adrenaline amusement park with sky-high roller coasters, virtual reality experiences, and family-friendly rides.

sites.title: Azure Lagoon Water Park
sites.description: A massive water park with giant wave pools, high-speed water slides, and a lazy river set against a luxurious resort backdrop.

sites.title: Ancient Wonders Heritage Park
sites.description: A historical attraction featuring life-sized replicas of ancient world wonders, interactive exhibits, and guided history tours.

sites.title: Moonlight Safari & Wildlife Reserve
sites.description: A unique nighttime safari experience featuring big cat sightings, stargazing, and luxury lodges.

sites.title: Crystal Peak Ski Resort
sites.description: A winter wonderland with world-class ski slopes, snowboarding trails, and cozy alpine lodges with breathtaking mountain views.
